analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/19/0x5c3d0012ff81bb9a19d13f8e512d3e72843f0848.sol#6-8) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5c3d0012ff81bb9a19d13f8e512d3e72843f0848.sol#17-25)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5c3d0012ff81bb9a19d13f8e512d3e72843f0848.sol#30-39)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5c3d0012ff81bb9a19d13f8e512d3e72843f0848.sol#43-51)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5c3d0012ff81bb9a19d13f8e512d3e72843f0848.sol#56-63)

SimpleFlyDropToken.multiSend has external calls inside a loop:
